name: Flighter Fighter
description:
Bullet hell shooter solo developed by Noccai.

Description

Defend yourself against endless waves of various enemies in this 2D bullet hell shooter!

How long can you last and how much score can you gain?

Controls

Left Mouse Button - Fire bullet

Right Mouse Button - Fly forward

Hold Esc to quit the game

Charging - Not shooting and flying causes the abilities to charge, shooting one massive piercing bullet and a burst of movement with flying respectively
